languages.text: "Надеюсь, мы быстро с этим покончим. Не сомневаюсь, что эти дела очень важные, но мои еще важнее".
"I hope we can get this over with quickly. As important as these cases may be, my personal business is even more so."
languages.original_text: "Надеюсь, мы быстро с этим покончим. Не сомневаюсь, что эти дела очень важные, но мои еще важнее".

traits.locale_text: "I hope we can get this over with quickly. As important as these cases may be, my personal business is even more so."
"I hope we can get this over with quickly. As important as these cases may be, my personal business is even more so."
"I hope we can get this over with quickly. As important as these cases may be, my personal business is even more so."
"I hope we can get this over with quickly. As important as these cases may be, my personal business is even more so."
"I hope we can get this over with quickly. As important as these cases may be, my personal business is even more so."
"I hope we can get this over with quickly. As important as these cases may be, my personal business is even more so."

languages.text: 「早く片付けられるといいんだが。いくら重要な案件でも、{mf|俺|私}個人の用件の方がもっと重要だからな」
languages.original_text: "I hope we can get this over with quickly. As important as these cases may be, my personal business is even more so."

traits.locale_text: 「早く片付けられるといいんだが。いくら重要な案件でも、{mf|俺|私}個人の用件の方がもっと重要だからな」

languages.text: "Hoffentlich können wir das rasch hinter uns bringen. Diese Fälle mögen wichtig sein, aber für meine persönlichen Angelegenheiten gilt das umso mehr."
languages.original_text: "I hope we can get this over with quickly. As important as these cases may be, my personal business is even more so."

traits.locale_text: "Hoffentlich können wir das rasch hinter uns bringen. Diese Fälle mögen wichtig sein, aber für meine persönlichen Angelegenheiten gilt das umso mehr."

languages.text: « J'ose espérer que ce sera vite réglé. Si importants soient-ils, vos "dossiers" ne le sont pas autant que mes affaires personnelles. »
languages.original_text: "I hope we can get this over with quickly. As important as these cases may be, my personal business is even more so."

traits.locale_text: « J'ose espérer que ce sera vite réglé. Si importants soient-ils, vos "dossiers" ne le sont pas autant que mes affaires personnelles. »

languages.text: «Confío en que podamos finiquitar esto cuanto antes. Por muy importante que sea este proceso, mis asuntos personales lo son aún más».
languages.original_text: "I hope we can get this over with quickly. As important as these cases may be, my personal business is even more so."

traits.locale_text: «Confío en que podamos finiquitar esto cuanto antes. Por muy importante que sea este proceso, mis asuntos personales lo son aún más».

languages.text: “我希望这件事情能赶紧说完。或许这些案件确实很重要，但我的个人事务更重要。”
languages.original_text: "I hope we can get this over with quickly. As important as these cases may be, my personal business is even more so."

traits.locale_text: “我希望这件事情能赶紧说完。或许这些案件确实很重要，但我的个人事务更重要。”

languages.text: "Umarım iş çabucak biter. Bu davalar mühim olabilir ama şahsi işlerim daha mühim."
languages.original_text: "I hope we can get this over with quickly. As important as these cases may be, my personal business is even more so."

traits.locale_text: "Umarım iş çabucak biter. Bu davalar mühim olabilir ama şahsi işlerim daha mühim."
